name: Mark M.
position: Fullstack Developer | Node.JS, Express.JS, PostgreSQL, React/Next.js
about: Backend-focused full-stack developer specializing in Node.js applications that scale. Currently shipped: Lingput.dev - AI-Powered Language Learning Platform ğŸš€ RECENT WINS: - Reduced application load time from 600 ms to 85 ms (-85.8%) by implementing caching for frequent database queries. - Resolved UI blocking issue during long-running story generation (~30s) by implementing a background job queue with BullMQ + Redis and streaming real-time progress updates to the frontend. - Developed automated CI/CD pipeline, reducing deployment time from 25 minutes to 5 minutes through full automation. - Eliminated 1.3s request latency during accessToken refresh by migrating session management from relational DB to Redis. - Architected clean, testable backend with layered architecture (Controller/Service/Repository) and dependency injection SPECIALIZING IN: Building backend systems that don't break under pressure â€” API design, database optimization, caching strategies, job queues, containerization, and production deployments. TECHNICAL SKILLS - Backend: Node.js, Express.js, TypeScript, JavaScript, Python, PostgreSQL, Prisma, Redis, BullMQ, GraphQL, MongoDB, Socket.io - AI/ML: OpenAI Agents SDK, CrewAI, LangGraph, MCP, OpenAI API, Anthropic API - Frontend: React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Astro - Cloud & DevOps, Tools: AWS, EC2, S3, Lambda, DO Docker, NGINX, CI/CD, GitHub Actions, Git, Jest - Architecture: System Design, Microservices, Caching, Database Optimization, API Design ğŸ“ San Jose, CA | ğŸŒ 25 countries explored | ğŸ› ï¸ Always building something My personal website: https://markmdev.com/ ğŸ’¼ Open to backend developer and full-stack developer roles â€” let's connect!
